Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE FUNCTION [EvaluatePermissionPropertyValue] ( @type VARCHAR(32), @permission_id CHAR(32), @identity_list VARCHAR(MAX) ) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( SELECT MAX (CASE WHEN ( acs.can_update = '1' AND @type = 'can_update' ) THEN 9 -- can_update permissions only WHEN ( acs.can_get = '1' AND @type = 'can_get' ) THEN 9 -- can_delete permissions only WHEN ( acs.can_change_access = '1' AND @type = 'can_change_access' ) THEN 9 -- can_change_access permissions only ELSE NULL -- No permissions on specified for specified access right END) p FROM (SELECT can_get, can_update, can_change_access FROM [ACCESS_PROPERTYVALUE] acs WHERE acs.[SOURCE_ID] = @permission_id AND (CHARINDEX(acs.[related_id] COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2, @identity_list) > 0) ) acs )
Item.name: EvaluatePermissionPropertyValue
